explains: v. （使）结束，（使）终止；到达终点站；终止妊娠，人工流产；<美>解雇；<美>谋杀（某人）；在……结尾，以……收尾
wordGroup: terminate a contract 终止合约

sentences.en: After a lot of agonizing she decided to terminate the pregnancy.
sentences.cn: 在多次痛苦的考虑后，她决定终止妊娠。

sentences.en: In American law, you cannot terminate an employee, for the sole purpose of age.
sentences.cn: 在美国法律中，你不能仅仅因为年龄而解雇员工。

sentences.en: This train will terminate at Lamy.
sentences.cn: 这列火车的终点站是拉米。
